Module com.fugaku.platformer

Package com.fugaku.platformer.view

package com.fugaku.platformer.view
Contains the classes that are responsible for the view for MVC pattern.

  • Class
    Description
    CompletedScreen
    This class represents the screen that is shown to the players when they have completed all levels of the game.
    FailScreen
    This class represents the screen that is shown to players when they fail a level.
    GameScreen
    Represents the main game screen where the game is displayed.
    LevelSelectScreen
    This class represents the screen where players can select the level they want to play.
    MenuScreen
    This class manages the main menu screen of the game.
    OptionScreen
    This class controls the option screen, allowing change background color
    PauseScreen
    This class controls the pause screen, allowing the game to be paused and resumed.
    RankScreen
    This class manages the main menu screen of the game.
    Screen
    Interface representing a screen in the application.
    TransitionScreen
    This class shows the screen that transitions the player from one level to the next.
